text:
I don't.

Yes you ARE! Yes you ARE!

text: This is the best comment thread

text: Yes it IS! Yes it IS!

text:
I will love you forever, comment thread!
Up to and including three years after you started!

name: soticoto
text: There be hugs and kisses this way!

name: karljw
text:
hellofyellin racks up 330 chubbies in 3 posts.

[i]OOOOOOOOHHHHHH SHIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIT

text: Man, that was back in my heyday.  I was pulling some mad chubs back then.  I miss those days.

text:
In the words of Zeus...

WISE FWOM WO GWAVE!

text: Awesome. You are the awesome. Altered Beast. Good knucklehead times.

text: WELCOME TO YOUR DOOM

name: coreythegreat
text: Its been one year and not one mention of how you said you pulled chubs. I expected that double entendre to be picked up immediately!

name: plummet
text: HELLA YELLIN ABOUT THE CHUBS

name: achilleselbow
text: You're wrong. According to Ultra Peanut, he's a retarded homo jackass.

name: bjorntd
text: Man, Ultra Peanut is a straight up bitch. Phillipe is  way too good for her.

name: pogo
text: Cubby for the reminder laugh.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Yep. Ultra Peanut talks to him like they've been married for 10 years.

name: selbencoirlo
text: Hemingway wishes he could write a six-word story with as much pathos as the above post. Take this chubby, you need it more than I do.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: I don't think Phillipe's retarded. I would NOT, however, rub money that came from  Circus Penis all over my face and body.

name: eric
text: I would also not place it under my eyelids and demand that strippers "take Ray's money!"

name: blarghamagarky
text: UNH!

name: aki
text: Oh man, when phrased as such, Circus Penis sounds like some fantastical club or disco.

name: thesoulbear
text: That'd be Penis Circus.

name: rumblefish
text:
See, some guy tried to sell my wife tickets to his Penis Circus and I beat him to death with a tire iron to retain a tenuous grasp on my identity as a male.

Now I feel like we might have missed out on a really great show.

name: greenkoolayd
text: i dont know what more precious, the male ego, or entertainment that possibly involves more than one male sex organ.

name: fattypneumonia
text:
Or his latest venture, a hotel/casino on the Las Vegas Strip:

[IMGS OFF]

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Jesus, what a Tee shirt that would make.

name: fattypneumonia
text:
Reposting myself (riposte-ing myself?):

His latest venture, a hotel/casino on the Las Vegas Strip:

http://i826.photobucket.com/albums/zz190/fattypneumonia/cc.jpg

name: dusty
text: I'm glad you did this, but we can't do it to all of them. Who decides to turn images off anyway? And why is this person/group such a dildo?

name: fattypneumonia
text:
There's some exploit in BBCode that allowed some unscrupulous types to gain control of the Achewood message boards through a certain image filetype. Thus the decision was made to turn off IMGs, to protect the site from further vulnerability.

Don't know if BBcode folks will build a newer version, fixing that exploit, or perhaps add a feature for site owners to allow only certain types of non-exploitable image files. (jpgs/gifs?)

Also don't know if Onstad would allow images to be turned back on, even if this were fixed.

Also don't know if anybody even WANTS images back anymore.

name: dusty
text: Why wouldn't we want them back? Many of them were great and the bad ones could be ignored or lamed out of view.

name: soticoto
text:
Some of my greatest ever posts here were images.
They got me mad chub-streams.

name: vweep
text: 69 chubbies! Sweet Heysoos!

name: crumpetsandtea
text: i wanted to chubby this, but you have EXACTLY 69 chubbies. not wanting to spoil that

name: dj
text: I admit to experiencing a great deal of momentary concern when Circus Penis says he'll do a "trick" for Philippe and reaches off panel.

name: mcwee
text: Agreed!  I sorta started to freak out in the middle of the Whole Foods Cafe.  No people are looking because I'm laughing and typing.  If I had a Bluetooth thing in my ear, everything would be fine, but I don't, so I just like like a lunatic.  FUCK!

name: c_dizzle
text: Concur. But the fact that he tactfully omitted the "penis" part of his name for introductions told me he wasn't going to do anything raunchy/illegal. (...is it illegal to expose yourself to stuffed otters?...maybe just stuffed 5-year-old otters)

name: pogo
text: That's okay, sometimes I "like like a lunatic" too.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Always walk around with a Bluetooth thing in your ear. That way you can say whatever you want to the voices and no one has a problem with it.

name: patkun
text: Philosophically speaking, I think Phillipe's onto something here. Now, when encountering a new object, I do my best to consider it not only in terms of its material uses, but also its tactile and aesthetic properties. It gives one a very valuable sense of perspective.

name: anonymous44
text: chainsaws

name: notcool
text: Foley catheters.

name: crinklebat
text: I think this is one of my favorites of all time. I used to be like this with money when I was a kid. Its immense power totally fascinated me.

name: cdl146
text: I like how Circus Penis introduces himself as simply "Circus" to children. Circus Penis has class.

name: soup_alex
text: Do you work at the circus?!

name: deancain29
text: In frame 8 I thought Philippe would have to grow up too fast. But thankfully the only money-shot was a literal one.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
Oh yeah. That panel right there, you know Onstad is at ease in his craft.
For the split second C-P reaches around for the "trick", he's hangin' us all out to dry.

name: davidadam
text: I feel so ashamed that it took me 5 years to get this part of the joke.

name: pitseleh
text: I think any strip that starts with Philippe in pirate garb, advertising hugs and kisses is an automatic 5/5! OMG, Philippe, how I love you!

name: tourach3
text: also people with elliott smith-related names automagically receive chubbies

name: pitseleh
text: I love the word "automagically". I don't know if that was intentional or not, but you get a chubby regardless!

name: equinn2006
text: Arrrhh! Me hates ye!

name: serf
text: id like to see more of circus penis. he was a pretty neat character

name: arbys
text:
I like how Philippe just throws off his costume in excitement.

Also: Now he can start paying off his debt to Ray for those four licenses for Eggs and Milk Pro.

name: crumpetsandtea
text: thats just the effect circus penis has on people in general

text: Am I the only one who imagines Circus Penis has the same voice as Hank Scorpio from The Simpsons?

text:
Philippe, don't go threatening hugs and kisses to any old soul who crosses your invisible border. This will only lead you into trouble later in life.

But also, hell of cuddles .

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Philippe: I thought of another haiku!

name: direhaggis
text: Circus Penis has a friendly, easy-going demeanor. More porn stars should be like him.

name: professorhazard
text: What makes you think they're not?

name: zedpower
text: I guess direhaggis is a porn director.

name: direhaggis
text: I'm not implying an evidence of absence, although I can see how it could be interpreted that way. There'll always be people hell of such as Circus Penis or Rod Huggins in any given profession. To my mind dude is just generally good people for being friendly with children, encouraging an entrepreneurial spirit a la Teodor, flying a plane what all is shaped as a cock, etcetera.

name: biznart
text: There is nothing more terrifying than a pirate threatening you with hugs and kisses.

name: tekende
text:
"I doubt seven dollars was ever promised so much in this world"

Absolutely fanTASTIC alt text. One of the best.

text:
The pornstar made the little otter exultant with seven dollars.
Awww.

name: crankheart
text: sooooooo in my top 5 now...

name: sevenslashfour
text:
oh god why is Philippe so cute oh god oh god.

On another note: the first (visible) comment on this comic spells his name "Phillipe." Several people have since commented with the same spelling, as well as a handful with the correct spelling. This led to severe confusion in the typing of this very comment.

name: archimedes2000
text: Why is this five year old answering the door for circus penis? Such as pirates are not afraid to open the door for strangers.

name: offendi
text: You're just not the same anymore, eight dollars...
